question: Birth Control question?
question_content:
I left a pill over at my boyfriends, and I need to know if I can take another one in place of that one. PLEASEEE ANSWERRR ME SOON,
i take it at 11:15.

answers.answer_content:
Yes, you can, but it's not a good idea to do it often. Some pills contain more or less hormones depending on what part of the month they're meant for, so try to take one that is close to where you are in your pack that you left at your boyfriend's.

I hope that makes sense :)

No, skip that pill and use an alternate method of birth controle, such as a condom, if you're going to have sex. Just be sure to take your pill on time tomorrow. Remember also that condoms are not fool proof so if you're worried about pregnancy then I would suggest abstinence until you take your next pill. Also if I'm not mistaken you should give it 24 hrs after you take your next pill to ensure full protection. Good luck!
just get ur tubes tied and its not a worry.
